API¶

distance module¶

calc_point_to_point_distance(points_a, points_b=None, allow_normalization=False)[source]

Function calculates distances between two group of points of a single group to itself.

Parameters:

  • points_a (numpy array) – Numpy array with point coordinates.

  • points_b (numpy array, default=None) – Point coordinates. If provided then algorithm calculates distances between points_a against points_b.

Returns:

distances – Array with distances from each point to other point.

Return type:

numpy array
